name: User Registration and Login
author: Dew Technolab

sections.description:
Set a custom registration and login for a user using the shortcodes. Using Ajax call send data. CSS and JS only load in registration and login page for SEO and speed page optimization.

For Registration Form Shortcode : [dew_register_form]

For Login Form Shortcode : [dew_signin_form]

For Profile Page Shortcode : [dew_profile_form]

Help Contribute

  • Leave a star rating
sections.installation:
Starting with User Registration and Login consists of just two steps: installing and setting up the shortcode. User Registration and Login is designed to work with your site’s specific needs, so don’t forget to go through the User Registration and Login configuration wizard as explained in the ‘after activation’ step!

INSTALL USER REGISTRATION FROM WITHIN WORDPRESS

  1. Visit the plugins page within your dashboard and select ‘Add New’;
  2. Search for ‘User Registration and Login’;
  3. Activate ‘User Registration and Login’ from your Plugins page;
  4. Go to ‘after activation’ below.

INSTALL USER REGISTRATION MANUALLY

  1. Upload the ‘dew-registration-login’ folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory;
  2. Activate the ‘User Registration and Login’ Plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress;
  3. Go to ‘after activation’ below.

AFTER ACTIVATION

  1. You should see the Dew Settings submenu in Setting menu;
  2. Go through the Dew Settings and set up the plugin for your site;
  3. You’re done!
sections.faq:
Do I need to have coding skills to use the User Registration Plugin?

No, you don’t need any coding skills. One can simply drag and drop fields, arrange them and use built-in shortcodes to display the form.

Does the plugin work with any WordPress themes?

Yes, the plugin is designed to work with any themes that have been coded following WordPress guidelines.

How can I access registered users data?

All the users registered via the registration forms and their data can be accessed from the Users menu in the WordPress Dashboard.

I can’t find a question similar to my issue; Where can I find support?

For more information please visit http://dewtechnolab.com and check out the blog section from User Registration and Login Plugin.
